task.name: PHP_Task
task.description: Executes a php script. The PHP script be changed through the variable 'pathname' in the task variables.

script.code:
String[] phpArguments = variables.get('phpArguments').split(' ') String[] command = ['php', '-f', variables.get('pathname')] String[] commandAndArguments = command + phpArguments
Process process = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(commandAndArguments)
process.waitForProcessOutput(System.out, System.err)
if( process.exitValue() != 0 ) { System.exit(process.exitValue()) }
